IDNotRecognisedException - Exception in cycling
Thrown when attempting to use an ID that does not exit in the system.
IDNotRecognisedException() - Constructor for exception cycling.IDNotRecognisedException
Constructs an instance of the exception with no message
IDNotRecognisedException(String) - Constructor for exception cycling.IDNotRecognisedException
Constructs an instance of the exception containing the message argument

Thrown when attempting to assign a race name already in use in the system.

Constructs an instance of the exception with no message

Constructs an instance of the exception containing the message argument
InvalidCheckpointsException - Exception in cycling
Each race result should contains the times for each segment (mountain and sprint) within a stage, plus the start time and the finish time.
